title: Several installed packages not displayed in 'spack find' or 'spack extensions python'
body:
3 python modules are installed via spack but aren't listed in the output of `spack find` and `spack extensions python`: `py-dateutil@2.4.2`, `py-pytz@2015.4`, and `py-six@1.9.0`.

```
herbein1@catalyst160:flux-core$ spack extensions python
==> python@2.7.11%gcc@4.4.7=chaos_5_x86_64_ib-j3ajpjn
==> 52 extensions:
cram     py-basemap    py-cython    py-genders  py-ipython   py-mako        py-mpi4py  py-numpy    py-pil     py-pychecker   py-pygments  py-pyparsing  py-python-daemon  py-scientificpython  py-setuptools  py-six     py-twisted     thrift  
geos     py-biopython  py-dateutil  py-gnuplot  py-libxml2   py-matplotlib  py-mx      py-pandas   py-pillow  py-pycparser   py-pylint    py-pyqt       py-pytz           py-scikit-learn      py-shiboken    py-sphinx  py-virtualenv  
libxml2  py-cffi       py-epydoc    py-h5py     py-lockfile  py-mock        py-nose    py-pexpect  py-pmw     py-pyelftools  py-pypar     py-pyside     py-rpy2           py-scipy             py-sip         py-sympy   py-yapf        

==> 8 installed:
-- chaos_5_x86_64_ib / gcc@4.4.7 --------------------------------
py-cffi@1.1.2  py-cython@0.22  py-matplotlib@1.4.3~gui~ipython  py-nose@1.3.6  py-numpy@1.9.2  py-pycparser@2.13  py-pytz@2015.4  py-setuptools@18.1

==> 10 currently activated:
-- chaos_5_x86_64_ib / gcc@4.4.7 --------------------------------
py-cffi@1.1.2  py-dateutil@2.4.2  py-matplotlib@1.4.3~gui~ipython  py-nose@1.3.6  py-numpy@1.9.2  py-pycparser@2.13  py-pyparsing@2.0.3  py-pytz@2015.4  py-setuptools@18.1  py-six@1.9.0

herbein1@catalyst160:flux-core$ spack install py-pytz@2015.4
==> py-pytz is already installed in /g/g17/herbein1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.4.7/py-pytz-2015.4-gnoxarfxidye3dwwigs2fj7dzq2myhx4.
herbein1@catalyst160:flux-core$ spack install py-six@1.9.0
==> py-six is already installed in /g/g17/herbein1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.4.7/py-six-1.9.0-o5dszj5jvucwugws3shw3t5mndwkgxtr.
herbein1@catalyst160:flux-core$ spack install py-dateutil@2.4.2
==> py-dateutil is already installed in /g/g17/herbein1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.4.7/py-dateutil-2.4.2-hle6nsoog5sptpxedv2bxc6lrqn4m657.
herbein1@catalyst160:flux-core$ spack find | grep py-
py-cffi@1.1.2                  
py-cython@0.22                 
py-matplotlib@1.4.3~gui~ipython
py-nose@1.3.6                  
py-numpy@1.9.2                 
py-pycparser@2.13              
py-pytz@2015.4                 
py-setuptools@18.1             
herbein1@catalyst160:flux-core$ python
Python 2.7.11 (default, Dec 30 2015, 10:24:47) 
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-16)] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import dateutil
>>> import pyparsing
>>> quit()
```
